Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution of indolicidin, bovine cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (64.29%) toIndolicidin analog HH972W: 33%.Activity: active against P. aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC 8 ug/ml), E. coli (MIC 4 ug/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 4 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC 2 ug/ml), E. faecalis ATCC29212 (MIC 8 ug/ml), and C. albicans (MIC 8 ug/ml). It is the most active one in this indolicidin variants.
Literature Information.Author: Hancock RE, Hilpert K, Cherkasov A, Fjell C.2006
Literature Information.Title: SMALL CATIONIC ANTIMICROBIAL peptides
